price: Katakanlah (Muhammad) kepada orang-orang yang kafir, "Kamu (pasti) akan dikalahkan dan digiring ke dalam neraka Jahanam. Dan itulah seburuk-buruk tempat tinggal."
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lilladhīna kafarū satugh'labūna watuḥ'sharūna ilā jahannama wabi'sa al-mihādu
